r.d: The PHP client library provides fast access to documents stored in a Couchbase Server.
r.n: - PCBC-251 Fix missing prefix from incr/decr/delete and unlock - Fixup observe test failure - Updated create function to include error message with lcb_create failures. - PCBC-226 Use HTTP POST if "keys" are specified - PCBC-246 Add support for LCB_CNTL_SKIP_CONFIGURATION_ERRORS_ON_CONNECT - PCBC-240: Fixup API descr of return value for touch - PCBC-241: Fix compile warnings - Added example of a Client wrapper for complete & partial updates - Updated support for getReplica - PCBC-236: Throw exceptions from constructor - PCBC-229: Fix --with-couchbase help text - PCBC-231: Remove obsolete version string - PCBC-228: Preserve extra error information
